roleset.name: to place or put down incorrectly
roleset.note: MISLAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mislay' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from mislay.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Chief Inspector Peter Seacomb of the Criminal Investigation Department at the airport said , `` It [*EXP*-1] is not uncommon for property-2 to be temporarily mislaid or misrouted [*-2]. ''
